raw_comment:
I noticed that  money does have a effect on getting into Elite Colleges but not that big of a effect compared to legacy applicants.
I wonder how they calculated the advantage without the legacy status
This has a impact on me and my community due to most of the kids my age are looking for collages and this graph will help them see the admissions advantage 
Elite Collages do you have legacy status.
ace_sentences: Money has an effect on admission to an elite college.
The effect of money is not as big as the effect of legacy status.
I wonder how the authors calculated the advantage without legacy status.
This information has an impact on me.
This information has an impact on my community.
Most kids of my age look for colleges.
The graph helps these kids see the admissions advantage.
The graph shows an admissions advantage for an elite college if an applicant has legacy status.
